ygData.subject: Re: Human SK god and stats?
ygData.msgSnippet: I was going to make a suggestion in the earlier post, but hit send to early. I would suggest creating a HSK of Innoruk and traveling to Neriak to see if you
ygData.messageBody:
I was going to make a suggestion in the earlier post, but hit send to early.
I would suggest creating a HSK of Innoruk and traveling to Neriak to see if
you can train there. If not, then I'm not sure either choice is better.
Cronik worships Thule. I am not entirely sure if it is racial or religious
differances that prevent me from taining there. I am able to train in
Freeport though. I have yet to go into Oggok other than to be bound in the
entrance.

Does worshiping Bertoxx make you start in Qeynos? I hate Freeport and would
choose to start in Qeynos anyday of the year. I have not done this, so I
also am not sure if the wandering Ranger NPCs will KoS you or not, though I
think they will. But it does give you access to the Karanas without all the
hassle that a DE or Troll has.
As far as stats go, I think what you have in mind will work fine.
Personally, I would increase them both by 10. But then again I don't know
how much Agility affects AC after 20th either.

--
Akenar "Cronik" Khaos <Dark Omen>
15th Season TSK
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
Bertoxx

Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Human SK god and stats?


| From: Rich Hitz <rich.hitz@...>
|
| If you only play Trolls, be careful about creatures that attack with
poison!
| I had played Cronik so long that I didn't worry about poison attacks
against
| my DE Rogue because I was used to the troll regen rate for HPs. Let me
tell
| you I have stopped attacking poisonous creatures with him. I died more
| times than I care to mention.
|
| --
| Setekh <Dark Omen>
| 5th Season DE Rogue
| Bertoxx

| From: <gkays@...>

| Subject: [shadowknight] Human SK god and stats?
|
|
| | From: <gkays@...>
| |
| | I've have 2 TSK characters, but have tired of both because of the
crushing
| EXP penalty, so I though I'd try out a human SK. A few questions:
| |
| | 1) What is the best god for HSK? Innoruuk or Bertox? Which cities can
| each enter safely without having to kill anything? I'm assuming the human
| cities plus High Hold for both, plus Neriak for Innoruuk SK's. Can either
| safely enter a city on either Faydwer or Erudin?
| |
| | 2) Starting stats. I was thinking +5 Str and + 15 AGI to set each to
90.
| Any thoughts on what a good Str value is. Should I bump it to 100. How
| heavy is medium armor?
| |
| | Thanks for any input.
| |
| | Scragg Wraithbone (22nd TSK on Bristlebane)
| | Scregg Wraithbone (7th TSK on Mith. Marr)
